ComicInfo.Summary:
Driven By Beauty: Pipo enlists Sergio to take Venus home but a few unusual occurrences happen on the way.
El Show Super Sensacional de Doralis: A sampling of Doralis' TV show.
Uncommon Bonds: A discussion of Doralis' tv show and whether Fritz should be in one, among other things.
Mama's Boy: The complicated lives of Sergio and Pipo
Huh..? Wha.?!: A discussion of Doralis' tv show
